HEADER.HEADER_ABOUT: Graduated Information Technology Engineer, throughout my career I have developed different roles and projects, including development and maintenance of web and desktop applications, management and optimization of relational databases, cloud computing (AWS). I am passionate about learning and applying new technologies to solve complex problems and improve system efficiency.

ABOUTME.ABOUT_ABOUT_DESCRIPTION: With 10 years of experience in technology and software development, providing support, maintenance and development of web and desktop applications, I have worked mainly for financial companies, ensuring optimal system performance. To learn more about my work experience, you can also check the education, experience and skills tabs.

404.404_BODY: Oops! The page you are looking for cannot be found, please try again later or return to the main page.

UNIVERSITY.UNIVERSITY_SUBTITLE: Information Systems Engineering and Computer Science
UNIVERSITY.UNIVERSITY_TEXT: I studied part of my university career at Mariano Galvez University of Guatemala, Chimaltenango and Antigua Guatemala campuses. I completed the curriculum in approximately 6 years. This career was a great challenge for me since at the high school level I had studied Automotive Mechanics, so the change of focus was significant for me, but I managed to adapt and learn a lot in the process, which helped me become the person I am today.

OPINIONS.OPINIONS_SUBTITLE: Be very patient with yourself and don't compare yourself too much with others.

FORM.FORM_DESCRIPTION: I am available for freelance work by hour or project that allows me to manage alongside my regular work. Connect with me through WhatsApp.
